title: Bug 17825ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is selected
description: Bug 17825ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText, a Windows 'ding' sound is heard.
EB: I expect no sound to be produced when selecting SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open ControlExampleText.
2. Select SWT.MULTI from the dropdown menu.
3. Observe if a Windows 'ding' sound is heard.
